nodes.title:
The case for an economic boom in 2021 is growing:

1. Stocks at all-time highs

2. Housing mkt is booming

3. Fiscal stimulus back on the table

4. Vaccine is coming

5. CARES act helped many ppl repair their personal balance sheets

6. Top Gun 2 will finally hit theaters
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

nodes.title:
1. Stocks: all-time highs.
2. Housing prices: all-time highs.
3. Corporate bond yields: all-time lows.
4. Mortgage rates: all-time lows.
5. Jerome Powell: the outlook is "extraordinarily uncertain." We need many more years of 0% interest rates and QE to stimulate the markets.
